Question: Which is the most popular game?
SQL:
select p.game_name, count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
group by p.game_name
order by count(*) desc
limit 1;

Question: What is the most popular genre?
SQL:
select g.type, count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
join "genre" g on p.game_name = g.game_name
group by g.type
order by count(*) desc
limit 1;

Question: Which country generates the highest revenue?
SQL:
select c.country, count(*)
from "order" o
join "customer" c on o.customer_name = c.name
group by c.country
order by count(*) desc
limit 1;

Question: Which is the most profitable game?
SQL:
select g.name, sum(g.price)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
join "game" g on p.game_name = g.name
group by g.name
order by sum(g.price) desc
limit 1;

Question: What is the most selling platform?
SQL:
select p.name, count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
group by p.name
order by count(*) desc
limit 1;

Question: How many orders where place on pc?
SQL:
select count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
where p.name = "PC";

Question: How many orders where place on pc for battlefield?
SQL:
select count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
where p.name = "PC"
and p.game_name = "BATTLEFIELD";

Question: How many orders where place on pc for battlefield from India?
SQL:
select count(*)
from "order" o
join "platform" p on o.platform_id = p.id
join "customer" c on o.customer_name = c.name
where p.name = "PC"
and p.game_name = "BATTLEFIELD"
and c.country = "INDIA";
